name.bg: Помощна програма за възстанов. на Chromebook
name.ja: Chromebook リカバリ ユーティリティ
name.th: ยูทิลิตีการกู้คืน Chromebook
name.vi: Tiện ích khôi phục dành cho Chromebook

short.ar: يمكنك إنشاء وسائط لاسترداد بيانات جهاز Chromebook.
short.am: ለእርስዎ Chromebook የመልሶ ማግኛ ማህደረ መረጃ ይፍጠሩ።
short.bg: Създайте носител за възстановяване за своя Chromebook.
short.bn: আপনার Chromebook-এর জন্য রিকভারি মিডিয়া তৈরি করুন।
short.ca: Crea un mitjà de recuperació per a Chromebook.
short.cs: Vytvořte si médium pro obnovení Chromebooku.
short.da: Opret et gendannelsesmedie til din Chromebook.
short.el: Δημιουργία μέσου ανάκτησης για το Chromebook.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,sk: Create recovery media for your Chromebook.
short.es: Crea un medio de recuperación para tu Chromebook.
short.es_419: Crea un medio de recuperación para la Chromebook.
short.fa: رسانه بازیابی برای Chromebook خود ایجاد کنید.
short.fil: Gumawa ng media sa pag-recover para sa iyong Chromebook.
short.fr: Créez un support de restauration pour votre Chromebook.
short.gu: તમારી Chromebook માટે પુનઃપ્રાપ્તિ મીડિયા બનાવો.
short.hi: अपने Chromebook के लिए रिकवरी मीडिया बनाएं.
short.hr: Izrada medija za oporavak za vaš Chromebook.
short.id: Buat media pemulihan untuk Chromebook Anda.
short.it: Crea supporti di ripristino per il tuo Chromebook.
short.ja: Chromebook のリカバリ メディアを作成します。
short.kn: ನಿಮ್ಮ Chromebook ಗೆ ಮರುಪ್ರಾಪ್ತಿ ಮಾಧ್ಯಮವನ್ನು ರಚಿಸಿ.
short.lv: Izveidojiet atkopšanas datu nesēju Chromebook datoram.
short.mr: तुमच्या Chromebook साठी रिकव्हरी मीडिया तयार करा.
short.ms: Buat media pemulihan untuk Chromebook anda.
short.nl: Maak een herstelmedium voor je Chromebook.
short.no: Opprett et gjenopprettingsmedium for Chromebooken din.
short.pt_BR: Criar mídia de recuperação para seu Chromebook.
short.pt_PT: Crie suportes de recuperação para o seu Chromebook.
short.ro: Creați un suport de recuperare pentru Chromebook.
short.sr: Направите медијуме за опоравак за Chromebook.
short.sw: Unda mbinu ya urejeshaji kwa ajili ya Chromebook yako.
short.te: మీ Chromebook కోసం రికవరీ మీడియాను రూపొందించండి.
short.th: สร้างสื่อการกู้คืนสำหรับ Chromebook
short.vi: Tạo phương tiện khôi phục cho Chromebook.
short.zh_CN: 为您的 Chromebook 创建恢复媒体。
short.zh_TW: 為 Chromebook 建立還原媒體。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,es_419,et,: This is a Chrome Extension for the Chromebook Recovery.
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,pt_BR,pt_PT,sk,zh_C:
This is a Chrome Extension for the Chromebook Recovery.

Use this tool on M55+ Chromebooks, Windows, and Mac devices to create recovery media. Instructions on how to use the tool can be found here: https://support.google.com/chromebook/answer/6002417

By installing this item, you agree to the Google Terms of Service and Privacy Policy at https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/.
